
        # -*- Entry points: -*-
        [console_scripts]
        curate=curate.command:curate

        [curate.builtins]

        [curate.actions]
        httpReq=curate.actions:httpReq
        curlReq=curate.actions:curlReq

        delTag=curate.actions:delTag
        addGroup=curate.actions:addGroup
